meta.title_zh: 換貨/諮詢：買錯、想換另一款

dialogue.text: Hello! How can I help you?
dialogue.zh:
你好! How 可以 我 幫忙 你?
こんにちは! How できます 私 手伝う あなた?

dialogue.text: Hi, I think I bought the wrong thing.
dialogue.zh:
嗨, 我 think 我 bought the wrong thing.
こんにちは, 私 think 私 bought the wrong thing.

What did 你 buy?
What did あなた buy?

This 咳嗽 syrup.
This 咳 syrup.

What seems wrong with it?
What seems wrong with it?

It makes me too sleepy.
It makes me too sleepy.

我 see. 是 it opened?
私 see. 私 it opened?

不, it’s unopened.
いいえ, it’s unopened.

你 有 the 發票?
Do あなた have the レシート?

是的, here it 是.
はい, here it 私.

dialogue.text: Would you like to exchange it?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like to exchange it?
Would あなた like to exchange it?

是的, a non-drowsy one.
はい, for a non-drowsy one.

好的. This one 是 non-drowsy.
わかりました. This one 私 non-drowsy.

太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: How often should I take it?
dialogue.zh:
How often should 我 take it?
How often should 私 take it?

dialogue.text: Two teaspoons, three times a day.
dialogue.zh:
Two teaspoons, three times a day.
Two teaspoons, three times a day.

dialogue.text: Should I take it after meals?
dialogue.zh:
Should 我 take it after meals?
Should 私 take it after meals?

是的, after meals 是 better.
はい, after meals 私 better.

任何 other symptoms, like 發燒?
Any other symptoms, like 熱?

不 發燒.
いいえ 熱.

dialogue.text: If symptoms last more than a week, see a doctor.
dialogue.zh:
If symptoms last more than a week, see a doctor.
If symptoms last more than a week, see a doctor.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: Do you want a smaller bottle?
dialogue.zh:
你 想要 a smaller bottle?
Do あなた want a smaller bottle?

是的, smaller 是 fine.
はい, smaller 私 fine.

Alright, 我’ll process the exchange.
Alright, 私’ll process the exchange.

謝謝 你.
ありがとう あなた.

Here’s your new 發票.
Here’s your new レシート.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

Take care!
Take care!

你 too.
あなた too.
